long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:

Our apps utilize OpenVPN technology or the IKEv2 protocol (for mobile devices), providing comprehensive protection for your devices.

★ Secure Browsing of Sensitive Content:
Ensure complete anonymity and enhanced data protection while browsing sensitive websites. Your privacy remains intact with our free VPN France.

★ Completely Free:
We are dedicated to providing free and secure VPN service for all users.
